functions.name: entra_admin_center_restrict_access
functions.description: Checks if Entra admin center access is restricted.

functions.name: entra_device_registration_require_mfa

notes: All functions are based on Azure Entra API.
Ensure proper Azure RBAC permissions are configured.
Consider regional vs global service differences.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Azure Resource Graph for efficient resource queries.
